com.atakmap.android.gps.bluetooth

Class NMEAMessageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.gps.bluetooth.NMEAMessageHelper

  • public class NMEAMessageHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Please note this is a direct copy of the capability currently within the serial monitor. The next revision will likely make this more modular.

      • createMessage

        public static java.lang.String createMessage(PacketRMC rmc,
                                             PacketGGA gga,
                                             java.lang.String src)
        Given both the rmc and gga packets, produce a valid external GPS input message. For the dilution, assume a best case accuracy of 3 meters - https://gis.stackexchange.com/questions/111004/translating-hdop-pdop-and-vdop-to-metric-accuracy-from-given-nmea-strings
